quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: And every time I point out the contradiction, they just go quiet.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: I know, and silence isn’t good enough when it comes to your safety.

quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: Exactly. Silence just proves they’re avoiding accountability.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: I’ve told them that I need answers in writing, not silence.

quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: But you see how I’m always the one having to push for this?

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: I do, and I know it’s exhausting for you.

contradictions.issue: Police silence when contradictions raised vs. advocate admits silence not acceptable but no escalation outcome
